column4: eh guys i cannot watch moviestreams, well not fluent moviestreams what do i need to change that, i have downloaded all the codecs, flashplayer an so on
i am using ubuntu 7.10 everything was working well with ubuntu 7.06 really strange
eh guys i cannot watch moviestreams, well not fluent moviestreams what do i need to do to  change that, i have downloaded all the codecs, flashplayer an so on
i am using ubuntu 7.10 everything was working well with ubuntu 7.06 really strange
do you mean movie streams as in Youtube stuff?
: yes i dont get fluent streams there :(
what do you mean by "fluent"?
well i just see one picture after the other
not really like a movie
do you have gnash installed?
yes but it doesnt really seem to work well dont know why
i would uninstall it and use flashplugin-nonfree instead
ok thnx i try that
i ot everything working well on ubuntu 7.06 bit strange
i got everything working well on ubuntu 7.06 bit strange
tis strange indeed
i did what u told me but now when i am on youtube.com they tell me to install the flashplayer but i have installed the flashplugin-nonfree???
yeah, as it says in the channel topic, the flashplugin-nonfree is currently broken (by Adobe), so it will be a little while before somebody updates it
the issue should be fixed "soon"
however, if you need Flash now, theres always the tutorial here:http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=636397
thnx
here is another helpful link, look at post #30: http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=632322&page=3
THANKS it works now :))
np
